mapper.select: SELECT * FROM theater ORDER BY theater_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO theater(theater_id, theater_name, theater_detail, theater_address, theater_image, theater_cat, theater_lat, theater_long) VALUES(#{theater_id}, #{theater_name}, #{theater_detail}, #{theater_address}, #{theater_image}, #{theater_cat}, #{theater_seats}, #{theater_lat}, #{theater_long})
mapper.update: UPDATE theater SET theater_name=#{theater_name}, theater_detail=#{theater_detail}, theater_address=#{theater_address}, theater_image=#{theater_image}, theater_cat=#{theater_cat}, theater_seats=#{theater_seats}, theater_lat=#{theater_lat}, theater_long=#{theater_long} WHERE theater_id=#{theater_id}
